Every player can get 3 ranu points by drawing 2 identical (squares, triangles, circles, lines) symbols among each other. In total there are 6 ranu points to collect.

-description from publisher

Name: Battle Bots: The Sling Sliders Game
Description: Battle Bots: The Sling sliders Game is a crokinole-style game that has players using an elastic band to shoot wooden discs into the centre of the game board, or into an opponent's area of the game board, to earn points. Get rid of all of your discs by slinging them straight or ricocheting them on your opponent's side of the board.

Name: Trivia in a Trunk: Rock & Roll Trivia
Description:
This exciting new music trivia game takes you from the earliest days of rock to the chart-topping bands of today. Packed with inside information about the songs, singers and albums you love, this is a must-have for anyone who enjoys a rockin' good time. Whether you know all the words or just hum along, the game's simple scoring method gives everyone a chance to win. Rock on with Trivia in a Trunk!

You'll be shocked by how much you know and how surprised by how much you find out!

—description from the back of the box
Families: Series: Trivia in a Trunk (Movie Game Inc)

Name: Tug of Words
Description:
A Game of Word Strategy

Play the word game everyone will love. Play TUG OF WORDS! It's a dynamic contest of word strategy! Shift, Jump and Place your letters as you attempt to outspell your opponent. Be the first to spell a five - letter word on your opponent's home row. But WATCH OUT! Your opponent is spelling words to take your letters! You'll want to foil his plans by taking his letters. Join the Battle! Join the fun! PLAY TUG OF WORDS.

—description from the back of the box

Name: Seek and Capture
Description:
Each player has 1 large piece (his Captain), 8 smaller pieces (his soldiers), and 5 red wall pieces.

The Captains start the game on the red spaces, surrounded by their soldiers. Walls are placed at the start of the game and cannot be moved or jumped but must be moved around. All other pieces move one space at a time, one per turn. Pieces are taken by jumping directly over an opponent's piece with a space to land on the other side (like in Checkers). You may also jump your own man and go on to take your opponents piece or pieces. You must jump an opponent's piece if it is left in a space beside one of your own men. The object of the game is to take your opponent's Captain.

The game is over when one players Captain piece is taken or when it is your turn to move and you are unable to.

—user summary

Name: Underworld
Description:
Underworld is a cooperative fantasy board game about establishing a colony in a newly discovered land that is hostile, dangerous and full of riches. The players will lead a band of rugged adventurers on perilous expeditions to explore the surrounding jungle, delve deep into ancient ruins and eventually descend into the darkest recesses of the earth - the Underworld. Deep in the heart of the jungle and hundreds of feet below the earth, they must contend with horrific foes and terrible afflictions in a violent and inhospitable place. The players must juggle the need to do damage with the importance of protecting the health and minds of their Adventurers. In this age of discovery, a fantastic new world lies before you with all its peril, promise and possibility!

—description from the publisher

Name: The Mentalist Mystery Game: Red Moon Uprising
Description:
The Party Adventure Game!  Host a night of Mystery in your home.  Invite your friends to take on the roles of suspects along with the Patrick Jane character, for an evening of Mystery and Intrigue.

Patrick Jane:  Independent consultant with the CBI.  He has a remarkable track record for solving crimes by using his amazing razor sharp skills of observation.

This party adventure contains:

A complete Party Planner with instructions, costume suggestions, tips for having fun and a [s] optional dinner menu.

Invitations and name tags for your guests.

Character profiles with secret clues and backgrounds for each guest.

A CD which re-enacts the sounds of the murder and outlines the plot.

The AUTHOR'S SOLUTION to the mystery.

—description from the back of the box

Name: Lawyer's Edition Technicality Cards
Description:
The trivia game for justice! (just us!)

3,000 true-false, multiple choice, and short answer Queries/Responses printed on miniature legal pads.

Suitable for play with any six category trivia game board.
The perfect gift for students and practitioners!

Lawyer's Edition Technicality Cards may be used as a subsidiary card set for play with any six category trivia game board, including the Master Game board of Trivial Pursuit.  It may also be played alone, without a game board of any type.
     If the game is used as a subsidiary card set of another six category trivia game, the rules of the primary game shall apply , with the colors used to identity the categories of this subsidiary card set precisely corresponding to the colors on the primary game board.
     If the game is played without the game board of a primary game, the object of play shall be to accumulate exactly 500 points.  A roll of a die (not included) shall determine the category from which a Query is asked. A correct Response shall result in another turn for that player; an incorrect Response in the turn passing to the player to the left.
     Points shall be awarded in accordance with the type of Query: 15 points for a Short Answer; 10 points for a Multiple Choice; and 5 points for a True/False.  Exactly 500 points and no more shall be required to win.  Consequently, strategy and the luck of the draw in answering a combination of Query types shall be important.

—user summary

Name: Intrigue No. 1: Drama and Investigation – Deadly Vacation
Description:
Turn your get-together with friends into an evening of intrigue and investigation.  Become suspects in a criminal case!

Who is the paradise campground killer?

On the morning of July 21, 2002, the lifeless body of Roger Burns, a retired lawyer and promoter responsible for the re-opening of a mini hydroelectric power station, was discovered along the river bordering the Paradise Campground.  The victim appeared to have been struck on the head with a blunt object.  The body was half submerged.

Who could have done such a thing?  It is up to you and your guests to solve the mystery during an evening in which everyone becomes an actor in an intriguing criminal investigation.

—user summary

Name: Intrigue No. 2: Drama and Investigation – Deadly Passage
Description:
Turn your get-together with friends into an evening of intrigue and investigation.  Become suspects in a criminal case!

Who killed the millionaire?

It is June 29, 1928.  American millionaire Holden Goldman has an important announcement to make and has invited eight guests on a cruise aboard his private yacht to the Galapagos Islands.  
     And so he made it!  The yacht had barely departed from the port of Lima when the Millionaire announced his recent marriage to his secretary, a woman 30 years his junior!  Despite their obvious amazement, all of his guests offered their best wishes to the newlyweds.
     After the astonishing news, the guests retired to their staterooms to prepare for supper and recover form their initial shock!  Suddenly, they heard a tremendous commotion above deck.  The Millionaire was found dead, stabbed to death.
Who could have done such a thing?  It is up to you and your guests to solve the mystery during an evening in which everyone becomes an actor in an intriguing criminal investigation.

—user summary

Name: Scene It?: 007 Super Game Pack
Description:
Add Bond clips, trivia cards and tokens to any Scene It? game OR play as a stand alone game!

Contains DVD and Trivia Cards from original James Bond game.

The official Bond trivia game with real movie clips!

Hosted by John Cleese!

Enter the amazing world of 007 with the James Bond Super Game Pack.  It's a great add-on to any full Scene It? game.

Meet Bond, James Bond.  Experience his incredible adventure. . . get close to his beautiful women . . . discover his lethal gadgets. . . and challenge your family and friends to answer Top Secret trivia about the world's most remarkable secret agent.

From the novice spy to the Bond aficionado, the Super Game Pack has the golden touch.  Enjoy scenes packed with the best of 007 - for your eyes only.   Any way you play, the James Bond Edition of Scene It? will leave you shaken and stirred.

—description from the box

Name: Bionicle Quest For the Masks CCG: Bohrok Swarm
Description: An addition to the first expansion, the Bohrok (Pronounced Bow-RocK) Swarm focuses on the Bohrok Story arc. This expansion features very similar to the base game, with the addition of a new mechanic called Bohrok Control.

Name: Bionicle Quest for the Masks CCG: Rahi Challenge
Description: Rahi Challenge, which was released in 2001, was a small expansion for the original base game. It included 90 cards, bringing the total card count from 220 to 310. Unlike the base game and the subsequent Bohrok Swarm expansion, it had no deck box packs. The expansion was only available through 9 card booster packs.

Name: Meeple Force
Description:
Meeple Force is a "one vs many" 5 player game. With 1-4 players pitting their wits as the heroes of the Meeple Force against the Swarm Lord player who controls the deadly aliens of the galaxy.

The game uses no dice or tape measures, instead it uses good old fashioned skill and dexterity. By flicking your heroes across your gaming space, you will soon find yourselves knee deep in the action of Meeple Force and when it's time to shoot your opponents, place your flickable munitions, from bullets, missiles and chainsaw rockets, on the table and flick them at the enemy!

You can play single missions just for fun for 20 to 30 minutes or have your heroes run the gauntlet of our campaigns, where all 5 players will upgrade and equip their heroes in order to save the galaxy or watch it burn!

However, not only do you upgrade and equip your heroes, the Swarm Lord player will also be upgrading their minions, while any wounds and ammo spent also carry on into the next missions, meaning you'll need to keep your heroes well stocked and healthy until those critical Boss Battle missions at the end of each campaign.

—description from the publisher

Name: Mechanisms: Thematicisms
Description:
The expansion to Mechanisms is finally ready! Themes are worlds which evoke emotion. When combined with mechanisms, games show themselves like a fine tuned beautiful machine. Help us celebrate the artists who showcase these worlds of vivid imaginings by putting your own pen to artistry in Thematicisms.

In this expansion, the worlds of the games we love come to life at the end of your pen. Players will draw cards and combine them to recreate works of art for other players to guess! The player who collects the most thematicism cards, wins!

-description from designer
